fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Taxation, Research and innovation, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: Quadrant House, Floor 6, Thomas More Square
eu_initiatives: MiFiR, MiFiD II, Securities Financing Transactions Regulation (SFTR),
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
GSAV Limited aims to address market pricing anomalies in collateralized lending markets by becoming the sole provider of pricing services and regulatory Alerts to the Fund Management business globally.   
 
GSAV is a disruptive fintech platform which targets the securities lending market by delivering a suite of tools empowering securities lenders, such as pension funds, insurance companies and asset managers with information and pricing on their securities lending activities, allowing these fund managers to take control over how their securities are being used, and ensuring they are getting their fair share of the financial benefit of their securities lending transactions. 
 
GSAV helps managers to fulfil the requirement on them to secure for their customers’ “best execution” at minimum cost by conducting oversight of their agent lender.
